channel.title: Cool Church Radio w/George Powell
channel.description: Cool Church Radio w/George Powell airs each Sunday morning at 10:00am on Portland, OR News/Talk Radio station KPAM 860. Cool Church Radio is hosted by Dave Proehl, and features Sr. Pastor Dr. George Powell, and Associate Pastor Dennis Quick. Each episode is built around a weekly lesson Dr. George has recently shared at Abundant Life. You're invited to listen in as Dave, Dennis and George engage in an unscripted, frank discussion about what it means to have a real, authentic relationship with God.
channel.copyright:
2008 - Abundant Life Church - 17241 SE Hemrick Rd., Damascus, OR 97089.
Cool Church Radio is a ministry of Abundant Life Church in Happy Valley, OR. Produced by Spirit Media, in partnership with Bridgeport Productions.
channel.itunes:author: Abundant Life Curch
channel.itunes:summary: Join Sr. Pastor George Powell, Pastor Dennis Quick and your host, Dave Proehl for an honest, authentic look having a real relationship with God. This show is broadcast each week on Portland, OR news/talk radio station KPAM 860.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Looking for straight talk and honest, unscripted dialogue about being a Christ follower? Join Sr. Pastor George Powell, Associate Pastor Dennis Quick and your host, Dave Proehl for an honest, authentic look having a real relationship with God.

item.title: Red Letter Words: Pray
item.description: It's talk about God...without a lot of 'God Talk.' This weekly program has been described as "Sports Talk for Jesus!" Join host Dave Proehl and co-host Pastor Dennis Quick as they engage in a spirited, comical discussion with Dr. George Powell, Sr. Pastor of Abundant Life Church in Happy Valley, OR a message he taught on one of the "Red Letter Words" that Jesus spoke, "Pray." This program originally aired on Portland, OR news/talk station at 8:00am on Sunday, December 27, 2009.

item.title: SPECIAL EDITION: Mission to Italy
item.description: This special edition of Cool Church Radio w/George Powell, hosted by Dave Proehl, features Dr. George Powell and Dennis Quick sharing stories of the work being accomplished by teams from Abundant Life Church in Naples, Italy. This special episode originally aired at 8:00am on Portland, OR news/talk station KPAM 860 on Sunday, November 8, 2009.

item.title: 7 Wonders of the Spiritual World: God Heals Me
item.description: Join host Dave Proehl and Pastor Dennis Quick, and special guest Scott Bradley from the Parkrose Campus as they discuss with Dr. George Powell a message on one of the seven wonders of the spiritual world that God heals us. This program originally aired on Portland, OR news/talk station KPAM 860 at 8:00am on Sunday, November 1, 2009.

item.title: 7 Wonders of the Spiritual World: Conqured Death
item.description: Join host Dave Proehl and Pastor Dennis Quick, as they discuss with Dr. George Powell a message on one of the seven wonders of the spiritual world, specifically the amazing truth the Christ not only died for us, but that he defeated death. This program originally aired on Portland, OR news/talk station KPAM 860 at 8:00am on Sunday, September 13, 2009.

This program originally aired on Portland, OR news/talk station KPAM 860 at 8:00am on Sunday, September 13, 2009.
item.itunes:subtitle: God Conqured Death for Me

item.title: 7 Wonders of the Spiritual World: Forgive
item.description: Join host Dave Proehl and Pastor Dennis Quick, as they discuss with Dr. George Powell a message on one of the seven wonders of the spiritual world, specifically the power of forgiveness and how it can have a dramatic impact on our vertical relationship with God, and our horizontal relationship with the people we interact with every day. This program originally aired on Portland, OR news/talk station KPAM 860 at 8:00am on Sunday, September 6, 2009.

item.itunes:subtitle: God Forgives Me

item.title: SPECIAL EDITION: Mission to Uganda
item.description: This special edition of Cool Church Radio w/George Powell, hosted by Dave Proehl, features Dr. George Powell and Tiffany Gosvenor sharing stories of the work being accomplished by teams from Abundant Life Church in Uganda. This special episode originally aired at 8:00am on Portland, OR news/talk station KPAM 860 on Sunday, August 30, 2009.

item.title: SPECIAL EDITION: Mission to India
item.description: This special edition of Cool Church Radio w/George Powell, hosted by Dave Proehl, features Dr. George Powell and Pastor Mike Vermace telling of their recent trip to India - a trip cut short by a potentially life-threatening encounter with extremists groups opposed to Christian missionaries. This special episode originally aired at 8:00am on Portland, OR news/talk station KPAM 860 on Sunday, August 23, 2009.
item.itunes:author: Abundant Life Curch
item.itunes:summary: This special edition of Cool Church Radio w/George Powell, hosted by Dave Proehl, features Dr. George Powell and Pastor Mike Vermace telling of their recent trip to India - a trip cut short by a potentially life-threatening encounter with extremists groups opposed to Christian missionaries. This special episode originally aired at 8:00am on Portland, OR news/talk station KPAM 860 on Sunday, August 23, 2009.

item.title: Ruth: Amazed by Love (3)
item.description: The story of Ruth, although a small book in the Old Testament, is both an amazing love story, and an incredible allegory of God's love for us. Join your host Dave Proehl, and Associate Pastor Dennis Quick as they talk with Dr. George Powell, Sr. Pastor at Abundant Life Church in Happy Valley, OR about this special series titled, "Amazed by Love". This is a re-broadcast of a program that originally aired on Portland, OR news/talk station KPAM 860 on Sunday, July 12, 2009. (NOTE: The introduction on each episode is the same, but is followed by a new lesson each week.)

item.itunes:subtitle: When the Way is Risky

item.title: Don't Blink - (Episode 3)
item.description: Because Life Goes By Faster Than You Think...Join your host Dave Proehl, and Associate Pastor Dennis Quick as they talk with Dr. George Powell, Sr. Pastor at Abundant Life Church in Happy Valley, OR about the brevity of life, and the power of making the most of every day. This is a re-broadcast of a program that originally aired on Portland, OR news/talk station KPAM 860 on Sunday, May 24, 2009.

item.title: "Is Jesus Coming Again?"
item.description: There are many questions about God that can be answered with the same word..."Absolutely!" - Join your host Dave Proehl, and Associate Pastor Dennis Quick as they talk with Dr. George Powell, Sr. Pastor at Abundant Life Church in Happy Valley, OR about the question of forgiveness. This is a re-broadcast of a program that originally aired on Portland, OR news/talk station KPAM 860 on Sunday, May 3, 2009.

item.title: The Money Maze Part 4
item.description: Discovering God's Path to Financial Peace. Join your host Dave Proehl, along with Dennis Quick and Sr. Pastor George Powell from Abundant Life Church as they discuss God's heart to help us each find the best path to peace during these trying, confusing financial times. This is a rebroadcast of a program that originally aired on Portland, OR news/talk radio station KPAM 860 on Sunday, March 29, 2009.

item.title: Reality Check: A Real Look at Growing Old
item.description: Join host Dave Proehl, Associate Pastor Dennis Quick, and the Sr. Pastor of Abundant Life Church, Dr. George Powell for a frank, lively table talk about the reality of growing old. This episode originally aired at 8:00am on Sunday, March 1, 2009 on Portland, OR news/talk radio station KPAM 860. For more information, go to www.coolchurchradio.com. Joining the table talk for this program is a special volunteer at Abundant Life, Luella Dunafun, to add additional insights on the topic of growing old.
item.itunes:author: Abundant Life Curch

item.title: Reality Check: A Real Look at Raising Kids
item.description: It's a frank, lively table talk discussion with host Dave Proehl, Associate Pastor Dennis Quick, and featuring the Sr. Pastor of Abundant Life Church, Dr. George Powell. This episode originally aired at 8:00am on Sunday, February 22, 2009 on Portland, OR news/talk radio station KPAM 860. For more information, go to www.coolchurchradio.com. Joining the table talk for this program is Josh Galgan, Pastor of Family Ministries at Abundant Life to add additional insights on the topic of raising children.

item.title: Reality Check: A Real Look at Being Married
item.description: It's a frank, lively table talk discussion with host Dave Proehl, Associate Pastor Dennis Quick, and featuring the Sr. Pastor of Abundant Life Church, Dr. George Powell. This episode originally aired at 8:00am on Sunday, February 15, 2009 on Portland, OR news/talk radio station KPAM 860. For more information, go to www.coolchurchradio.com. Joining the table talk for this program is Ann Powell, wife of over 33 years to George Powell. Ann team taught the lesson when it was originally shared at Abundant Life, and joins the table talk team today for additional insights on the topic of marriage.

This episode originally aired at 8:00am on Sunday, February 15, 2009 on Portland, OR news/talk radio station KPAM 860. For more information, go to www.coolchurchradio.com. Joining the table talk for this program is Ann Powell, wife of over 33 years to George Powell. Ann team taught the lesson when it was originally shared at Abundant Life, and joins the table talk team today for additional insights on the topic of marriage.

item.title: Reality Check: A Real Look at Being Single
item.description:
Join in a frank, lively table talk discussion with host Dave Proehl, Associate Pastor Dennis Quick, and featuring the Sr. Pastor of Abundant Life Church, Dr. George Powell. This episode originally aired at 8:00am on Sunday, February 8, 2009 on Portland, OR news/talk radio station KPAM 860. For more information, go to www.coolchurchradio.com.
Joining the table talk for this program is special guest Rachel Long. Rachel is on staff at Abundant Life, and shared her insights with Pastor George on the high's and low's - joy's and challenge's of being single.

item.title: Facing the Giant of Family Responsibility
item.description: "Facing the Giant of Family Responsibility" - Cool Church Radio w/George Powell. This show aired on Portland, OR radio station KPAM 860 on Sunday, November 23rd. Hosted by Pastor Dave Proehl, this show features a great table talk with Abundant Life Church Sr. Pastor George Powell, and Associate Pastor Dennis Quick, on the topic of learning how to take on those giants that get in our way of moving forward in life. Joining the group for this episode is Pastor Greg Strannigan from Cornerstone Church in Gresham, OR.

item.title: "Finding Wholeness" - No Perfect People Allowed
item.description: "Finding Wholeness" - No Perfect People Allowed. Originally broadcast on Portland, OR news/talk station KPAM 860. Pastors George Powell, Dave Proehl and Dennis Quick have an unscripted, frank discussion about the topic of finding wholeness, as they listen to a message shared by Dr. George Powell with the people at Abundant Life Church in Happy Valley, OR.

item.title: "No Perfect People Allowed" - Show Pilot
item.description: No Perfect People Allowed! This is the pilot episode of Cool Church Radio with George Powell. The show originally aired on Portland Radio Station KPAM 860 at 7:00am on Sunday, September 7, 2008. It marked a unique milestone in Portland, OR secular radio.
